AuthorizationType.description: The authorization type of the license.

enumDescriptions.Capacity: The license authorizes the feature to a number of devices, but not restricts to specific device.
enumDescriptions.Device: The license authorizes the feature per device.
enumDescriptions.Unlimited: The license has no limits on the device to use the feature.

AuthorizationType.longDescription: This property shall describe the authorization type for features.

License.description: The License schema describes a license for the specified feature.
License.longDescription: This resource shall represent a license for a Redfish implementation.

enumDescriptions.Builtin: A license was built in the product.

enumLongDescriptions.Prototype: The prototype version of license shall contain a prototype version of license which is designed for the development or internal use.
enumLongDescriptions.Purchased: The purchased license shall contain a license purchased by user.
enumLongDescriptions.Trial: The trial license shall contain a trial version of license for the user.

title: #License.License
